description:
The story and tech of Read the Docs

Presented by Eric Holscher

Hosting open source documentation was a mess. The best-of-class solution
for the Python world as uploading a tarball of html to
packages.python.org or doing similar to upload to github pages. We set
out to solve this problem using the current best of class tools that
Django has to offer.
title: The story and tech of Read the Docs
